TopicTitle: Grab Kerbal Space Program on the Steam Summer Sale!

Articles.Content:
<p><iframe frameborder="0" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/17XveO-u6cs" width="420"></iframe></p>

<p><span><em>Kerbal Space Program</em> is part of the <a href="http://bit.ly/17wvuVl"><strong>STEAM SUMMER SALE</strong></a> and the team is celebrating the excitement with this brand new animated trailer. Grab <em>KSP</em> today - no claw necessary.</span></p>
LOL, that video was hilarious! Good job guys!
Props to DanRosas yet again for delivering a very funny video! Can't wait for the 0.24 video release either

Great video.

And if you would put those animations in the game finally I would be very happy. It is a friendly hint with a wink.
I loooove these Kerbal Videos so mutch! How much effort must went in these clips...but they are so coooool:cool:
turn off the video audio and play the James bond theme as the kerbal runs away from the claw. T'is amazing!
One of the most hilarious KSP videos yet! I actually burst out laughing!

seriously I love you guys!

These animations are just so cute and fun to watch
I love the video. To bad there is no way to save it to my pc. Would love to be able to watch these videos without having to connect to youtube.

I love the video. To bad there is no way to save it to my pc. Would love to be able to watch these videos without having to connect to youtube.

There are many sites which allow you to download Youtube videos, for example KeepVid.
